title: Bible Believers' Bulletin, Vol.1-5 - Dr. Peter S. Ruckman
description:
The Bible Believers' Bulletin is a monthly publication of the Bible Baptist Bookstore featuring articles by Dr. Peter S. Ruckman and others on a variety of topics. Its first issue was printed in May of 1978.
The articles from the first 22 years of its publication are now being reproduced in a series of volumes grouped according to subject and specific topics. Volume I presents articles on the ?Authorized Version? of the Holy Bible. I these articles, you will learn how to defend the ?King James? Bible as the Holy scriptures; how to identify and refute the men (and their arguments) who would destroy the Christian?s faith in the pure word of God in the English language.

This set includes:
1) The AV Holy Bible - Bible Believers' Bulletin Volume 1
2) Corrupt Bible Versions - Bible Believers' Bulletin Volume 2
3) Doctrinal Studies - Bible Believers' Bulletin Volume 3
4) The Pope and the Vatican - Bible Believers' Bulletin Volume 4
5) Politics and Conspiracies - Bible Believers' Bulletin Volume 5


About the author:
Dr. Peter S. Ruckman received his Bachelor of Arts degree from the University of Alabama and finished his formal education with six years of training at Bob Jones University (four full years and two accelerated summer sessions), completing requirements for the Master of Arts and Doctor of Philosophy degree.
Reading at a rate of seven hundred words per minute, Dr. Ruckman had managed to read about 6,500 books before receiving his doctorate, and he still reads an average of a book each day.
Dr. Ruckman stands for the absolute authority of the Authorized Version and offers no apology to any recognized scholar anywhere for his stand. In addition to preaching the gospel and teaching the Bible, Dr. Ruckman has produced a comprehensive collection of apologetic and polemic literature and resources supporting the authority of the Authorized Version of the Holy scriptures
